ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(RecordType.Name == 'Distributor GPP 0.0', RecordType.Name == 'Distributor GPP 1.0'), $Profile.Name != 'Data Loader Profile', Text(Accreditation_Type__c) == 'Product', OR( Text(Accreditation_Level__c) != 'Distributor', AND( Text( Pricing_Level_Override__c) != 'Distributor', Text( Pricing_Level_Override__c) != '') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the following values are allowed: Distributor
